table.name: its4you_signature
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `its4you_signature` ( `signatureid` int(19) NOT NULL, `signature_name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `signature_no` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `signature_date` date DEFAULT NULL, `status` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `signature_mode` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `senton` date DEFAULT NULL, `template` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `language` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `source_module` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `source_record` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`signatureid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB

table.name: its4you_signaturecf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `its4you_signaturecf` ( `signatureid` int(19) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`signatureid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB

table.name: its4you_signature_settings
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `its4you_signature_settings` ( `signid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `signed_email_subject` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `signed_email_message` text DEFAULT NULL, `accept_email_subject` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `accept_email_message` text DEFAULT NULL, `email_subject` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `email_message` text DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`signid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB

table.name: vtiger_its4yousignature_user_field
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_its4yousignature_user_field` ( `recordid` int(25) NOT NULL, `userid` int(25) NOT NULL, `starred` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, KEY `recordid` (`recordid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB
